page.title: 04Thistle Centre Stirling
page.content: The centre has historical parts too. The old names of streets such as Orchardcroft, Castle Gait, Bastion Wynd and Ochilview Mall have been kept. Hanging from the ceilings are collages showing the signs of the old trades of Stirling. These are the Baxters, Fleshers, Skinners, Taylors, Shoemakers, Hammermen and Weavers. The Bastion is an old dungeon. It is in the Thistle Centre and was originally on the old Stirling Wall. The Bastion is now used as a small museum. There is a tape recording running all the time telling about its history. There are two showcases displaying different types of medieval costumes. The Thistle Centre is indeed a very pleasant shopping area,and when you go there it is more like an outing than shopping.
